actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to restore eligibility for child's insurance benefits to postsecondary school students, in the case of existing children of covered workers.
short_title: Social Security Student Benefits Restoration Act of 1985
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Student Benefits Restoration Act of 1985 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to permit full-time postsecondary school students to receive child's insurance benefits on the basis of student status. (Currently, only full-time elementary or secondary school students may receive such benefits on the basis of student status.)

titles.title: Social Security Student Benefits Restoration Act of 1985
A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to restore eligibility for child's insurance benefits to postsecondary school students, in the case of existing children of covered workers.
